title.rendered: Grab Your Marketing Automation White Paper

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1570736542435{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508815961967{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]So what’s behind the explosive growth in marketing automation among agencies? This white paper, Taking Your Agency and Your Clients to the Next Level with Marketing Automation, provides some insight.

Included in this report:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

  • The current state of digital marketing
  • The difference between B2B and B2C marketing
  • The role of marketing automation
  • The agency objective
  • Implementation challenges and solutions

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1508816077503{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]It’s packed with key data points to help you understand marketing automation tools. It also includes strategies for implementing marketing automation for various types of audiences.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

80% of marketing agencies use marketing automation to some extent, and an additional 14% are planning to use the tool in the future. Is your agency leveraging this technology?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]

Get Your Free Whitepaper:

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We Work With Everyone

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”158137″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”158136″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”158135″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”158134″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
